Articles.Content: Might be kinda weird to go back, but i caught onto ksp at the about 7 dollars, which is like version .8 or .9 and i want to go back farther. anywhere to download the previous versions of ksp before that? like .3ish would be cool.

Hi ilikemoneygreen, I doubt such old versions are available anywhere, I did see a link to the 0.8 version recently though, it is still hosted on one of HarvesteR's old blog posts, it may be that versions as far back as 0.3 are only to be found in the depths of HarvesteR's hard drives.

I found it, here it is!

Edited August 6, 2012 by sal_vager

There are plans to eventually release an archive of past versions, possibly in a Gold edition of the game or something. Harv has definitely said he wants to make them available if possible in the future.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I thought .0 - .7 was early game development cause the game was not good enough to go public yet. If you played before .03 I think, Kerbin wouldn't even exist, just a flat surface.

Edited August 8, 2012 by swiftgates24
wow if the game started at .7 then i guess i started playing this near the start. thanks for the link and help everyone.
